name: Classic Cap
description: A timeless classic cap that suits any occasion. With its minimalist design and comfortable fit, it's a versatile accessory for your everyday style.

name: Stylish Denim Cap
description: Add a touch of style with this denim cap. Crafted with high-quality denim fabric, it's perfect for casual outings and adds an effortlessly cool vibe to your look.

name: Sporty Performance Cap
description: Get ready for any sports activity with this sporty cap. Engineered for performance, its lightweight and breathable design keeps you comfortable while you conquer your goals.

name: Urban Streetwear Cap
description: Elevate your street style with this urban-inspired cap. Its unique design and bold logo make a statement, while the adjustable strap ensures a customized fit.

name: Vintage Camo Cap
description: Embrace the retro vibe with this vintage camo cap. The camo pattern adds a touch of nostalgia, and the soft cotton material ensures all-day comfort.

name: Classic Trucker Cap
description: Stay cool and casual with this classic trucker cap. The mesh back provides ventilation, and the adjustable snapback closure ensures a snug fit.

name: Sleek Leather Cap
description: Elevate your style with this sleek leather cap. Crafted from genuine leather, it adds a touch of sophistication to your outfit and exudes modern elegance.

name: Retro Snapback Cap
description: Step back in time with this retro snapback cap. Its vibrant colors and vintage design capture the essence of the past while keeping your style fresh.

name: Active Mesh Cap
description: Stay active and stylish with this mesh cap. The breathable mesh material keeps you cool during workouts, and the adjustable strap ensures a secure fit.

name: Minimalist Logo Cap
description: Keep it simple and stylish with this minimalist logo cap. The clean design and subtle logo embroidery make it a versatile accessory for any outfit.

name: Outdoor Adventure Cap
description: Gear up for outdoor explorations with this adventure cap. Its durable construction and adjustable strap ensure a comfortable fit on all your journeys.

name: Classic Baseball Cap
description: The classic baseball cap never goes out of style. With a curved brim and embroidered logo, it's a versatile accessory for everyday wear.

name: Vintage Logo Cap
description: Capture the essence of vintage with this logo cap. The retro-inspired design and distressed logo add character to your casual look.

name: Casual Dad Cap
description: Embrace the casual cool of a dad cap. With its relaxed fit and curved brim, it's the perfect accessory to complete your laid-back style.

name: Urban Snapback Cap
description: Elevate your streetwear game with this urban snapback cap. Its bold design and structured fit make a statement wherever you go.

name: Vintage Corduroy Cap
description: Add a touch of nostalgia with this vintage corduroy cap. The textured fabric and adjustable strap combine style and comfort in one.

name: Color Block Cap
description: Make a bold statement with this color block cap. The vibrant colors and modern design add a pop of energy to your ensemble.

name: Premium Wool Cap
description: Elevate your winter style with this premium wool cap. The warm and soft wool material ensures cozy comfort, even on the coldest days.

name: Vintage Patch Cap
description: Add character to your look with this vintage patch cap. The distressed patches and classic design give a nod to retro aesthetics.

name: Athletic Performance Cap
description: Maximize your athletic performance with this high-tech cap. It's designed to wick away sweat and provide optimal ventilation, keeping you focused on your goals.

name: Classic Tweed Cap
description: Elevate your style with this classic tweed cap. The sophisticated tweed fabric adds texture and refinement to your outfit.

name: Modern Logo Cap
description: Make a statement with this modern logo cap. The bold logo embroidery and sleek design add a contemporary touch to your look.
